around the corner ... Ancient Roman sculpture, discovered in Rome in 1541.
search_results.title: Rick Steves Heart of Italy in 9 Days | Day 7: Florence and David

search_results.snippet:
Nov 3, 2014 ... Benvenuto Cellini, an Italian goldsmith and sculptor, was born Nov. ... Cellini's 
most famous piece of bronze casting is the Perseus with the Head of Medusa in 
Florence (first image above). ... November 3, 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm...
search_results.title: Benvenuto Cellini (Honorary) - Scientist of the Day - Linda Hall Library
